description:
You can sure tell by Trian's photos that he is funny guy. He is relaxed and comfortable being naked. Clearly he was having a fun time doing photos and giving us some playful and lively images.

Thankfully, that was just a momentary lapse. He recovers quickly and hits a home run with that giant bat of his!
title: Trian - Solo
